entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Mingan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Longue-Pointe-de-Mingan 06:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: E 30 km/h gust 61 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain this morning then to flurries this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Local blowing snow early this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 100 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 this morning then southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:15 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:15 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
